feed.title: Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Measure Azure App Sustainability by Using the SCI Score
entry.summary: Create a sustainability model based on available proxies that scores the carbon impact of an application.

entry.title: SAP deployment in Azure using an Oracle database
entry.summary: Learn proven practices for running SAP on Oracle in Azure, with high availability.

entry.title: Scalable cloud applications and SRE
entry.summary: Build scalable cloud applications by using performance modeling and other principles and practices of site reliability engineering (SRE).

entry.title: Data warehousing and analytics
entry.summary: This example demonstrates a data pipeline that integrates large amounts of data from multiple sources into a unified analytics platform in Azure.

entry.title: Esri ArcGIS Platform on Azure Virtual Desktop
entry.summary: View a reference architecture that shows how to deploy ArcGIS Pro in Azure Virtual Desktop to support the hyperscale of Azure.

entry.title: Analytics end-to-end with Azure Synapse
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Data Services to build a modern analytics platform capable of handling the most common data challenges in an organization.

entry.title: AKS triage—Workload deployments
entry.summary: Learn how to check whether workload deployments and DaemonSet features are running properly. This step is part of the triage practices for an AKS cluster.

entry.title: AKS triage—Node health
entry.summary: Learn about the triage step in which you examine the health of Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) worker nodes and pods and resolve issues.

entry.title: Azure Firewall and Application Gateway for Virtual Networks
entry.summary: Learn about options and best practices for how to use Azure Firewall and Azure Application Gateway security in virtual networks.

entry.title: Securely managed web applications
entry.summary: Learn about deploying secure applications using the Azure App Service Environment, the Azure Application Gateway service, and Web Application Firewall.

entry.title: Azure OpenAI chat baseline architecture in an Azure landing zone
entry.summary: Learn how to build on the Azure OpenAI chat baseline architecture to address changes and expectations when you deploy it in an Azure landing zone.

entry.title: Baseline OpenAI End-to-End Chat Reference Architecture
entry.summary: Use this baseline reference architecture to learn how to build network-secured, highly available, and zone-redundant enterprise chat applications on Azure.

entry.title: Basic OpenAI End-to-End Chat Reference Architecture
entry.summary: Establish foundational knowledge for how to build and deploy enterprise chat applications by using Azure OpenAI, Azure AI Foundry, and Azure App Service.

entry.title: Azure Data Factory enterprise hardened architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to design an enterprise-hardened workload for Azure Data Factory on Azure landing zones to build robust and efficient data pipelines.

entry.title: Azure Data Factory mission-critical architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to design a mission-critical workload for Azure Data Factory on Azure landing zones to build robust and efficient data pipelines.

entry.title: Azure Data Factory on Azure landing zones baseline architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to design and implement the medallion lakehouse architecture on Azure landing zones by using Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, SQL Server, and Power BI.

entry.title: Multi-region load balancing
entry.summary: Learn how to build an Azure system that serves web and non-web workloads with resilient multi-tier applications in multiple Azure regions.

entry.title: Administer SQL Server with Azure Arc
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Arc for management, maintenance, and monitoring of SQL Server instances in on-premises and multicloud environments.

entry.title: Azure Local baseline reference architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to design Azure Local for highly available virtualized and containerized workloads

entry.title: Use Azure Local stretched clusters for disaster recovery
entry.summary: This reference architecture illustrates how to design and implement disaster recovery of Azure Local by using stretched clustering.

entry.title: Monitor hybrid availability, performance
entry.summary: Use Azure Monitor to monitor performance and availability for OS workloads running on-premises, in third-party cloud providers, and in Microsoft Azure.

entry.title: Implement cross-directory communication in Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to implement bidirectional, secure communications between services that are hosted in Azure subscriptions that different Microsoft Entra directories manage.

entry.title: Secure a data lakehouse on Synapse
entry.summary: Learn how to secure a data lakehouse that's implemented by using Azure Synapse Analytics.

entry.title: IBM z/OS mainframe migration with Avanade AMT
entry.summary: See how to use the Avanade Automated Migration Technology (AMT) framework to migrate IBM z/OS mainframe workloads to Azure.

entry.title: Migrate mainframe data to Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use RDRS, a mainframe data replication solution, to migrate data to and from multiple Azure data platform services.

entry.title: Replatform AIX workloads on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to replatform AIX workloads on Azure to reduce your TCO, improve business agility, and improve operational resiliency.

entry.title: Implement TIC 3.0 compliance
entry.summary: Implement Trusted Internet Connection (TIC) 3.0 compliance for your internet-facing Azure applications and services, and improve the user experience.

entry.title: Near real-time lakehouse data processing
entry.summary: Use Azure Event Hubs, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Azure Data Lake Storage to create an end-to-end, near real-time data lakehouse data processing solution.

entry.title: Build real-time monitoring and observable systems for media
entry.summary: Learn how to implement real-time monitoring and observability of systems and end-user device telemetry data.

entry.title: Multitenant SaaS on Azure
entry.summary: Build a multitenant SaaS solution on Azure, designed for high availability, scalability, data security and isolation using the App Service and Azure Kubernetes Service.

entry.title: Real-time analytics on data with Azure Service Bus and Azure Data Explorer
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Service Bus and Azure Data Explorer to enhance an existing message broker architecture with near real-time analytics.

entry.title: Machine Learning operations maturity model
entry.summary: A detailed explanation of the MLOps maturity model stages which lists defining characteristics of each stage.

entry.title: Computer Forensics Chain of Custody in Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to create an infrastructure and workflow to help ensure a valid digital evidence chain of custody (CoC) for computer forensics in Azure.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) baseline architecture for AKS on Azure Local
entry.summary: Learn how to design and implement a baseline architecture for Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) running on Azure Local.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) network architecture for AKS on Azure Local
entry.summary: Learn how to design and implement network concepts for deploying Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) nodes on AKS clusters.

entry.title: Azure Files Accessed from On-Premises and Secured by AD DS in a Private Network
entry.summary: Learn how to provide on-premises access to Azure Files with security provided by on-premises Windows Server Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS).

entry.title: WordPress on App Service
entry.summary: Use Azure Front Door, Azure App Service, and other Azure services to deploy a highly scalable and secure installation of WordPress.

entry.title: WordPress on Azure Kubernetes Service
entry.summary: Use Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) to deploy a highly scalable and secure installation of WordPress that's a good fit for large, storage-intensive applications.

entry.title: Azure API Management landing zone architecture
entry.summary: An opinionated architecture to deploy a secure enterprise-ready API management solution and CI/CD pipeline.

entry.title: Refactor mainframe architecture by using CloudFrame Renovate
entry.summary: Refactor your mainframe architecture to Azure by using the CloudFrame Renovate code migration tool. Renovate migrates COBOL to Java.

entry.title: Extend mainframe applications to Azure by using Verastream Host Integrator
entry.summary: Extend your mainframe applications to Azure by using the Verastream Host Integrator (VHI). VHI simplifies mainframe and host-based application functionality into a web service.

entry.title: Extend mainframes to digital channels by using standards-based REST APIs
entry.summary: Learn how the digital transformation architecture extends mainframe applications to Azure without disruptions or modifications to the existing applications.

entry.title: General mainframe refactor to Azure
entry.summary: See how to refactor general mainframe applications to run more cost-effectively and efficiently on Azure.

entry.title: IBM System i (AS/400) to Azure using Infinite i
entry.summary: Use Infinite i to easily migrate your IBM System i (AS/400) workloads to Azure. You can lower costs, improve performance, improve availability, and modernize.

entry.title: Modern Web App Pattern for Java
entry.summary: Implement the Modern Web App pattern for Java. Get prescriptive architecture, code, and configuration guidance.

entry.title: Automate PDF forms processing
entry.summary: Use Azure services such as AI Document Intelligence, Azure Logic Apps, and Azure Functions to implement cost-effective and flexible automated PDF processing.

entry.title: Deploy Azure Landing Zones
entry.summary: Learn about deployment options for both platform and application landing zones in Azure to help ensure governance and cost efficiency.

entry.title: Develop a RAG Solution—Information-Retrieval Phase
entry.summary: Learn about how to configure a search index, the types of searches that you can perform, how to break queries into subqueries, and why and how to rerank queries.

entry.title: Compare Storage Services on Azure and AWS
entry.summary: Review storage technology differences between Azure and AWS. Compare Azure Storage with S3, EBS, EFS, and Glacier.

entry.title: Choose an Azure service for vector search
entry.summary: Learn how to use this information to decide which Azure service for vector search best suits your application.

entry.title: Stream Processing with Databricks
entry.summary: Learn how to create a four-stage, end-to-end stream processing pipeline in Azure by using Azure Databricks.
